org.gvsig.fmap.dal.coverage

Interface BufferFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferFactoryImpl

    public interface BufferFactory
    Factory for raster buffers

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Buffer createBuffer(BufferParam param)
      Creates a buffer with the selected parameters
      BufferParam createBufferParams(int w, int h, int bandCount, int dataType, boolean malloc)
      Creates a parameter object for building a buffer.
      BufferParam createMemoryBufferParams(int w, int h, int bandCount, int dataType, boolean malloc)
      Creates a parameter object for building a buffer.

      Creates a parameter object for building a buffer.

    • Method Detail

      • createBufferParams

        BufferParam createBufferParams(int w,
                             int h,
                             int bandCount,
                             int dataType,
                             boolean malloc)
        Creates a parameter object for building a buffer. The buffer type is read-write. This type could be changed after the creation of a BufferParam object. The buffer will be cached if it's necessary
        Parameters:
        w - Width
        h - Height
        bandCount - Number of bands
        dataType - Type of data

      • createMemoryBufferParams

        BufferParam createMemoryBufferParams(int w,
                                   int h,
                                   int bandCount,
                                   int dataType,
                                   boolean malloc)
        Creates a parameter object for building a buffer. The buffer type is read-write. This type could be changed after the creation of a BufferParam object. The buffer will be stored in memory.
        Parameters:
        w - Width
        h - Height
        bandCount - Number of bands
        dataType - Type of data

      • createReadOnlyBufferParams

        BufferParam createReadOnlyBufferParams(RasterDataStore store,
                                     int minx,
                                     int miny,
                                     int maxx,
                                     int maxy,
                                     BandList bandList)
        Creates a parameter object for building a buffer. For this call the buffer type is read-only.
        Returns:
        BufferParam
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createBuffer

        Buffer createBuffer(BufferParam param)
                    throws BufferCreationException
        Creates a buffer with the selected parameters
        Parameters:
        param -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        BufferCreationException
